summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the centralized contactNumbers in siteContent.ts to include the “+91 ” prefix. However, the diff summary provides no visible evidence that the standalone landing page contact numbers were updated (REQ-2) or that tel/sms/wa.me deep links were adjusted to strip non-digits after adding the prefix (REQ-3). Additionally, project tracking/summary files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the standalone (non-React) landing page contact numbers to include the "+91 " prefix everywhere they are displayed, and ensure the standalone page still generates a valid wa.me link by stripping non-digits.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided truncation of frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone/script.js does not show any CONTENT.contact.whatsapp/CONTENT.contact.phone fields nor any wa.me link generation/normalization logic, so there is no evidence the numbers were updated or that non-digit stripping for wa.me is in place.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure phone/WhatsApp/SMS deep links (tel:, sms:, and https://wa.me/...) continue to work by using digit-only numbers after adding the “+91 ” prefix to stored numbers.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence is shown for React components/pages where tel:, sms:, or wa.me links are constructed/used, and the standalone script truncation does not show digit-stripping logic. Therefore, it cannot be verified that deep links now contain only digits.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (does not show link construction changes)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata unrelated to the requested phone-number prefix changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to modify any project state/tracking JSON; only frontend phone number display/link behavior is requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified a generated/aggregated frontend file summary document.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating documentation or summary inventory files; only code/content changes related to phone numbers are in scope.
